'''Radiant Spincrystal 141''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[All the Pretty Courses]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [["Flower-Feather Clan"]] area.
